Theodores gloves of kinship were enchanted gauntlets from the ancient elven city of Myth Drannor.
Theodores gloves of kinship were masterfully-sewn leather gauntlets.
These gauntlets possessed magics that enhanced the wearers natural charisma, appeal, and reaction speed in battle. Additionally, they allowed the wearer to cast the charm monster spell at will. The gloves held four charges of the spell.
The gloves of kinship belonged to Theodore of the Myth Drannor, predating the citys fall in the Weeping War. By the , Theodores gloves of kinship were hidden within the deeper levels of the Elven Catacombs underneath Castle Cormanthor. The gloves were locked in a room that survived centuries undisturbed. Along with the gloves of kinship, the room held several healing potions as well as a set of keys to the lower chambers of the ancient elven dungeon.
